articles.description: The UK records a further 649 deaths, taking the total number of coronavirus deaths to 30,076.
articles.content:
Image copyrightPA MediaImage caption
 More than 13,000 people are being treated for Covid-19 in hospitals around Britain
The UK has become the first country in Europe to pass 30,000 coronavirus deaths, according to the latest government figures.

articles.author: Ella Pengelly
articles.title: Latest figures reveal rise in coronavirus patient deaths in and around Cambridgeshire - Cambridgeshire Live
articles.description: 289 people have now died after contracting coronavirus in the county
articles.content:
The total number of patients who have died from coronavirus in Cambridgeshire hospitals has reached 289.
The latest figures released by NHS England show that The North West Anglia Trust, which runs Peterborough and Hinchingbrooke Hospitals, remains the worst… [+5708 chars]

articles.author: Lisa O'Brien
articles.title: Three more Shropshire coronavirus patients die as county hospital death toll reaches 111 - shropshirestar.com
articles.description: Three more patients have died at hospitals in Shropshire after testing positive for coronavirus.
articles.content:
They were all being cared for by Shrewsbury and Telford Hospital NHS Trust (SaTH), according to the latest figures from NHS England. 
The number of people who have died in the county's hospitals after contracting the virus now stands at 111.
